[vc_row][vc_column][investment_title align=”Default” tag=”h1″ title=”How we work” add_underline=”yes” style=”underline_small”]Many businesses, large and small, have a huge source of great ideas that can help them improve, innovate, and grow, and yet so many of these companies never think of using this amazing corporate asset. What is this highly valuable asset? Its own people. Says Morgan Fraud, the author of The Thinking.[/investment_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][investment_quote]We seek to invest in well positioned companies with strategic improvement potential and partner with management teams to create value by driving revenue and earnings growth capital for both sides.[/investment_quote][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
